dialogue.text: You fucking {i}what?{/i}
Needless to say, talking to Ami did not exactly go well.
Ami, if that’s what Sensei wants-
No, we clearly just misheard him. Isn’t that right, Sensei? Why don’t you tell us again so we can make sure we’re not going deaf?
I want to leave the house.
Wow! Weird! I’m still mishearing you! Cause I could have sworn you told me just a little while ago that you wanted to stay here, and {i}now{/i} it sounds like you’re saying you want to leave!
I wonder if that has anything to do with something Ayane told you in the ten minutes it took her to destroy our home.
I-
It wasn’t Ayane’s idea. It was mine. So if you’re going to yell at anyone, yell at me.

Yeah. So you just suddenly regain complete consciousness after two months of pissing in a bucket and it {i}doesn’t{/i} have anything to do with the one outlier I opened your door for. That makes total sense.
I obviously know how it looks. And...maybe Ayane {i}did{/i} help me reach this conclusion in some way, but it’s not like she pushed me to do this. I just...
I shouldn’t stay here anymore, Ami.
Why? What sort of revelation have you had in the last ten minutes that is now compelling you to throw away our sanctuary? What do you hope to gain from putting yourself in harm’s way again?
You literally told me {i}this morning{/i} that you want to stay here with me. Are you saying that was a lie? Are you lying to me after everything I’ve gone through to keep {i}you{/i} safe?
Because I won’t let you keep lying to me, Sensei! I’ve let you get away with it far too many times already and I’m not about to just bend over right now and let you keep fucking me like this!
Unless you actually {i}want{/i} to fuck me of course. Just, we’d have to let Ayane watch. And I don’t really mind since she deserves some sort of punishment after all she’s done today.
In fact, why don’t I invite Uta and Io over and let {i}them{/i} watch you fuck me too! Why don’t I invite {i}everyone{/i} over, Sensei?! Why don’t I just do that?!
You want to know why? Because I love you. I love you a lot. Like a lot a lot a lot a lot a lot. So much that I’m willing to let all this slide because you’re clearly just delirious right now.
Ami-

Did she pay you? Is this a prank? How much did she pay? What’d it cost to buy your fake participation, Sensei? Tell me now so I can start saving up and make you pretend to love me in front of my friends.
What changed?!?! What happened in there?!? I knew I shouldn’t have let her in! I knew it I knew it I knew it I knew it {b}I FUCKING KNEW IT!{/b}
Ayane!!!!!!!! What did you do???!?!!! What do you have to say about this?!!!??!!
Ami, I told you...this isn’t because of-
You don’t have to speak for me, Sensei. I can answer her myself.
Well then? I’m waiting.
I didn’t know this was going to happen, Ami. Hell, how {i}could{/i} I have known when you invited me over {i}this morning?{/i}
For all I knew, I wasn’t going to see Sensei for another year.
But you {i}did{/i} see him. And it took you no more than {b}TEN MINUTES{/b} to manipulate him into thinking he’s okay! But he’s {i}not{/i} okay! He’s losing his fucking mind! Just look at him!
Sensei, let’s get you back to your room. I’ll send Ayane home and we can spend the rest of the day watching movies and eating snacks. It’ll be a ton of fun. That’s what you want, right?
Right now, I just want to talk.
Thennnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn fuck it! Ayane can stay too! And all three of us can watch movies together! And I’ll allow her to come visit on weekends!
That’s not enough, Ami.
Mondays too! Maybe Wednesdays! And I’ll...oh!
You can fuck each other!
Ami!
Just once per week, though! And Sensei will have to wear a condom {i}and{/i} pull out just to be extra safe and not get you pregnant. Also, I get to join in whenever I want.
Ami, stop! Just listen to yourself!
Fine! I won’t join in then! But I’m still going to stay in the room because it’s only fair that I get to watch if I live here too! I’m not bending on the condom thing, though. That rule has to stay.
Because if I have to raise your baby {i}and{/i} Sensei, I’m going to be preeeeeeeeeeetty busy pretty much all the time and I still need to have a little bit of fun on my own, you know? Hahahaha!
Oh! Can I keep the condoms when you’re done with them???? Just to make sure they’re properly disposed of, of course. Not to suck the cum out of them. Because that’d be like, totally weird.
And I’m not weird at all! I’m a niece! Which isn’t me saying I don’t like cum. I think cum is great. Especially your cum, Sensei!
Y-
Scratch that. Your cum is the {i}only{/i} cum I like. And yeah I do want to drink it. But I also realize that now probably isn’t the right time to- sorry. What were we talking about again?
I’m...I should leave.
Yeah. Thanks for trying, Ayane. I’ve got it from here.
That’s right! Bye, Ayane! Sensei needs to get back to resting or he’ll never get over his sickness! I’m sure you’ll understand if you never see him again, right? Okay! Bye!
Ayane rushes out of the room and suddenly it’s just-
Okay, nap time! Night, night!
Give me your hand.
Want my mouth instead? It’s warmer.
Clothes on or off?! Which hole do you want?! Where are you going to cum?! Can I turn my camera on?!
Ami, I need you to breathe for a second.

{size=-5}Sorry! I’m just so excited knowing that you’re going to stay here forever and that we’re going to be all alone and that everything is okay and that you’re {i}not{/i} going back to being a rampant creeper who has sex with all of my friends!{/size}
I’m not going to stay here forever, Ami.
Yes you are! You’re going to stay here forever and love me and only me! Those are the rules!
I’ll stay here for {i}one more week.{/i} But after that, I need to...bring some sense of normalcy back to my life. And I can’t do that if I’m in here.
Sure you can! We’ve got a big screen TV with 500 channels and a fridge with extra shelf space! What more could you ever need out of life?!
I have no clue. And that’s exactly the problem.
Sounds like a pretty tiny problem to me! Ami is using her “niece veto” to reject your proposal! Please make passionate love to her now as penance.
Ami, listen to me!
No! You’re going insane and saying things you don’t mean!
I left you alone for ten minutes! {b}TEN MINUTES!{/b} And now you’re telling me your whole opinion of our sanctuary has changed?!?! We are {b}SAFE{/b} here!
Why do you keep calling it a sanctuary?
Because that’s what it is! And that’s what it’s {i}been{/i} for the last two months until people started interfering!
And how do you think those two months were for me? Because I don’t remember anything about them.
Yeah! Isn’t that great?! It’s exactly what you wanted!
Blocking out the pain has always been your preferred method of coping! And I’ve found the perfect way to enable it so you won’t ever have to hurt again! Praise me! Tell me I’m amazing!
Or just put your dick in my mouth! That works too! Whatever you want, [amimaster]!
What I want is to have an actual conversation about this, but we can’t {i}do{/i} that if you’re going to take my place as the one who’s gone completely mad.
{i}Me?{/i} Ami Arakawa? {i}Gone mad?{/i} Well, I never! How could you even insinuate such a thing, [amimaster]? That hurts!
It’s okay, you know. If you want to be the broken one this time.
You don’t always have to take care of me. I can take care of you for once.
You?! Take care of {i}me?!{/i} That’s not how this works! That’s {i}never{/i} how this works! You’re the one who breaks and {i}I’m{/i} the one who cooks and cleans and combs your hair!
If I left {i}any{/i} of those responsibilities to you, I’d have to cut off all my hair, burn our laundry, and then die of malnutrition shortly after waking up from my sadness-coma.
Besides, {i}I’m{/i} not the one coping with something right now! That’s {i}you!{/i} So why not just...you know...cope the way you always do?! In bed! With me by your side!
{i}I’m pretty sure she misses you. Even if she won’t say it.{/i}
{i}Please, come back to us.{/i}
Because just {i}coping{/i} isn’t enough anymore.
So what? You’re going to just decide you’re not sad anymore and get on with your life? Are you just totally healed all of a sudden?
Healed? Absolutely not. I feel like I’m fucking dying right now.
So your solution is to run into traffic?! You’re going to make me suffer through that same tragedy again in an even {i}worse{/i} way?! Do you hate me that much?!
I don’t hate you, Ami!
Then why are you trying to hurt me?!
I’m just...
Hah...
I know you’re doing all you can. And I’m very proud of you for that. I mean it.
Your methods might not be the most...{i}conventional.{/i} But I’m not the most conventional person. And expecting a girl your age to be able to deal with me when I’m that broken is just unreasonable.
But it’s not! I’ve done it before! And everything was perfect until people started trying to steal you again.
Things were supposed to be different this time. You were supposed to stay here forever.
So you would have been happy if I was just catatonic for the rest of my life?
Not {i}forever.{/i} But at least another year or two. And then you’d wake up and realize how good of a job  I did and then marry me and get me pregnant.
Listen...I’ll spend more time with you. I’ll...show you how much you mean to me more often. And besides, it’s not like I’m expecting to just “go back to normal” overnight.
This is going to be a process and I’m going to need your help.
I can’t help you out there.
It’s {i}scary{/i} out there. That’s why I keep you {i}here.{/i}
You can’t trust people, Sensei. They always want something out of you. Every single one of them has ulterior motives and they just...
You can’t trust them. But you can trust {i}me.{/i} I’m the one who’s always been here. {i}Me.{/i}
Which means you’ll be with me no matter {i}where{/i} I go, doesn’t it?
I don’t know anymore...
You’re planning on leaving me then?
I think you’ve got it backwards. I won’t {i}be able{/i} to follow you if you keep trying to break my kneecaps. And that’s exactly what you’re doing right now.
One week, Ami.
I’ll stay here with you until winter break is over. I won’t talk to anyone but you and I’ll spend all of my time {i}with you.{/i}
Unless you break again. Right? If you break again, you’ll stay forever?
Or until I wake back up.
But luckily for you, I’ve grown rather accustomed to dreaming as of late. So, who knows? Maybe I’ll feel safer asleep and wind up staying in bed a little longer than anticipated after all.
I won’t accept this...I won’t support you putting yourself in harm’s way for {i}any{/i} reason. Let alone one as ridiculous as...whatever it was you said before.
You don’t have to accept it, Ami.
You just have to be there.
Later that night, I pledge to isolate myself from everyone and everything but Ami until school starts again.
This means nothing for most as, to them, I’ve already been gone for two months.
But I know the girl who was here earlier will be dying inside for the next week as she wonders what happened after she left.
I’m sure she’ll return tomorrow. And I’m sure she’ll have a million questions about why I’m confined to my room once more.
Maybe Ami will answer her, maybe she won’t.
I have no way of knowing without being told and, at least from my point of view, she seems completely opposed to mentioning {i}anyone{/i} but her unless she absolutely has to.
But...do you know what the saddest part of all of this is?
I don’t {i}want{/i} to leave.
I don’t {i}want{/i} to risk getting hurt again.
I want to stay here, where I know it’s safe.
Where I have someone who loves me — someone I love back.
But I can’t.
Because sometimes, forcing people to do things they’re not comfortable with is the best way to move them forward.
There’s a pair of scissors on the desk that whispers this to me in a voice I’d rather forget.
I go to sleep with my tail tucked between my legs.
And I count down the days until those scissors help me cut my teeth at coping.
